column4: Hello :) Is it possible to reinstall Nautilus without having to format everything?
why do you want to reinstall nautilus?

Nautilus seems to always be freezing up when I play music; I'm having to type "killall nautilus" in the terminal once every several minutes after I've listened to music for a while. My previous installation of Gutsy didn't do this, so I just want to see if reinstalling helps things
'reinstalling' is windows thinking.. try making a new user. see if it affects them also.. if it does not affect them. then its somthing to do with your gnome users settings.
